title: Metal bar see-saw

children.value:
A long uniform metal bar of mass 
$\valuedef{M}{1}{kg}$
 is pivoted about its mid-point and three masses are hung from it, the first is a distance 
$\vari{x_1}$
 to the left of the pivot and has a mass 
$\valuedef{m_1}{5}{kg}$
. The second is a distance 
$\valuedef{x_2}{10}{cm}$
 to the left of the pivot and has a mass 
$\valuedef{m_2}{20}{kg}$
. The third mass is a distance 
$\valuedef{x_3}{45}{cm}$
 to the right of the pivot and has a mass 
$\valuedef{m_3}{10}{kg}$
. The whole system is in equilibrium.

Calculate the reaction force at the pivot and find the distance 
$\vari{x_1}$
.
